title.narrative: Gender Stock-take and Design of Sri Lanka Program

description.narrative: Funding under this initiative will provide a policy framework outline for gender development assistance in Sri Lanka, including identify key stakeholders, challenges related to policy dialogue and implementation, and assist Sri Lanka to achieve Millennium Development Goal (MDG) 3 to promote gender equality and empower women through existing programs. this initiative will also analyse how gender equality is being addressed, integrated and mainstreamed within the exiting program deliverables, identify opportunities, challenges and gaps, recommend areas and strategies for improvement. The total value of this initiative is $50,000 expensed during the 2012-13 financial year.
